Uses of Interface
org.jgrapes.core.ComponentFactory

Packages that use ComponentFactory
Package
Description
org.jgrapes.core
Defines the interfaces and classes that provide the core functionality of the JGrapes event driven component framework.
org.jgrapes.http
Provides components for building a HTTP server based on the core and IO components.
org.jgrapes.util
Utility components that are too small to deserve individual libraries/projects.

    Subinterfaces of ComponentFactory in org.jgrapes.http
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    HttpRequestHandlerFactory
    A component factory that creates components with at least one handler for Request events.

  • Uses of ComponentFactory in org.jgrapes.util

    Classes in org.jgrapes.util with type parameters of type ComponentFactory
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ComponentCollector<F extends ComponentFactory>
    A component that collects all component factory services of a given type and uses each to create one or more components that are then attached to the component collector instance.
